definition: Roth (name)/Kenneth Roth (1955-), executive director of Human Rights Watch 人權觀察|人权观察[Ren2 quan2 Guan1 cha2]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Roosevelt (name)/Theodore Roosevelt (1858-1919), US President 1901-1909/Franklin D. Roosevelt (1882-1945), US President 1933-1945
Soros (name)/George Soros or György Schwartz (1930-), Hungarian American financial speculator and millionaire philanthropist
Russian ethnic group (of northeast China and Xinjiang etc)/Russian nationality/Russians (of Russia)
Rostov-on-Don, Russian river port and regional capital close to Sea of Azov (north of the Black Sea)
Qian Gorlos Mongol autonomous county in Songyuan 松原, Jilin
pinyin: Qian2 guo1 er3 Luo2 si1 Meng3 gu3 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
containing_words.word: 前郭尔罗斯蒙古族自治县

definition: Aeschylus (c. 524 BC -c. 455 BC), Greek tragedian, author of The Persians, Seven against Thebes etc

pinyin: Za1 ge2 luo2 si1 shan1 mai4

sentences.english: Russia says that Iran and North Korea do not have missiles capable of striking Europe.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯说，伊朗和北韩没有掌握可以打击欧洲的导弹。

sentences.english: Russia, a major oil producer, is unlikely to embrace any ambitious emissions reductions.
sentences.chinese: 产油大国俄罗斯不太可能欢迎任何大幅减排计划。

sentences.english: Europe and Russia accounted for bulk of tobacco exports in the current year.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和俄罗斯占本年度烟草出口的大部分。

sentences.english: It was bound for the Russian Republic of Dagestan in the North Caucasus.
sentences.chinese: 该飞机飞往北高加索地区的达吉斯坦俄罗斯共和国。

sentences.english: Rachel watches Ben while Ross has a meeting, and she teaches him all about practical jokes.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯开会，瑞秋替他照看儿子班并教他恶作剧。

sentences.english: Russia has long wished to keep the West away from its backyard.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯长久以来都渴望让西方国家远离他的后院。

sentences.english: Mr Zorin says this kind of social engineering is the key to understanding today's problem.
sentences.chinese: 佐林指出这种社会工程是理解俄罗斯现有问题的关键。

sentences.english: After years of Ross mooning over Rachel, she finally found out that he was in love with her.
sentences.chinese: 在罗斯暗恋瑞秋多年后，这个傻丫头终于发现了。

sentences.english: The Russian official assessed that Pyongyang was "hunkering down for a succession crisis.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯官员认为朝鲜会坚守继承的传统。

sentences.english: Now Russia, for at least the second time, has fired on a Chinese civilian ship.
sentences.chinese: 现在俄罗斯，至少第二次，解雇了在中国民用船。

sentences.english: Rose is simply the new kid on the block, they argue.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯只不过是一个乳臭未干的小子，他们说。

sentences.english: Before bed, standing in the wood-rich hall of the Russian Hill house, she counted her cash.
sentences.chinese: 睡觉前，她站在俄罗斯风格房子的木客厅，算钱。

sentences.english: Mongolia and Russia, based on the use of Cyrillic alphabet text.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古和俄罗斯境内的使用斯拉夫字母为基础的文字。

sentences.english: Russian cuisine is famous for its soups such as borscht and meat dishes.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯菜以它的各种汤和荤菜著名于世。

sentences.english: After Nikolay's departure, it was more depressing than ever in the Rostovs' house.
sentences.chinese: 尼古拉离开之后，罗斯托夫家中比任何时候更忧郁了。

sentences.english: Los howl'd in a dismal stupor.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯在可怕的昏迷中嚎叫。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Wade (name)/Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), sinologist 威妥瑪|威妥玛[Wei1 Tuo3 ma3]
